mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID ,ORG_CD ,ACCOUNT_NUM ,TRANS_DTIME ,TRANS_NO ,TRANS_TYPE ,CURRENCY_CODE ,TRANS_AMT ,API_TRAN_DAY ,API_TRAN_ID ,REG_USER_ID ,REG_DT ,CHG_USER_ID ,CHG_DT FROM BANK_ACC_PROD_HIST WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND ORG_CD = #{orgCd} AND ACCOUNT_NUM = #{accountNum} AND TRANS_DTIME = #{transDtime} AND TRANS_NO = #{transNo}

SELECT H1.MEMBER_ID ,H1.ORG_CD ,H1.ACCOUNT_NUM ,H1.TRANS_DTIME ,H1.TRANS_NO ,H1.TRANS_TYPE ,H1.CURRENCY_CODE ,H1.TRANS_AMT ,H1.API_TRAN_DAY ,H1.API_TRAN_ID ,H1.REG_USER_ID ,H1.REG_DT ,H1.CHG_USER_ID ,H1.CHG_DT FROM BANK_ACC_PROD_HIST H1, ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT MEMBER_ID, ORG_CD, ACCOUNT_NUM, TRANS_DTIME , TRANS_NO FROM BANK_ACC_PROD_HIST WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND ORG_CD = #{orgCd} AND ACCOUNT_NUM = #{accountNum} ORDER BY MEMBER_ID, ORG_CD, ACCOUNT_NUM, TRANS_DTIME DESC, TRANS_NO DESC ) WHERE rownum = 1 ) H2 WHERE H1.MEMBER_ID = H2.MEMBER_ID AND H1.ORG_CD = H2.ORG_CD AND H1.ACCOUNT_NUM = H2.ACCOUNT_NUM AND H1.TRANS_DTIME = H2.TRANS_DTIME AND H1.TRANS_NO = H2.TRANS_NO
